channel.title: Recent Hurricanes, Cyclones and Typhoons - ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, Esri
channel.description: This layer features tropical storm (hurricanes, typhoons, cyclones) tracks, positions, and observed wind swaths from the past hurricane season for the Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian Basins.

item.title: Recent Hurricanes, Cyclones and Typhoons - ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, Esri
